samples.context: Rock shelters are also found inside the Satpura National Park. These are evidences of prehistoric human life in these jungles. These give us an idea of the life of primitive people. Rock paintings are found in these shelters.
samples.question: What do rock shelters indicate about history?

samples.context: A total of 55 rock shelters have been identified in Pachmarhi Biosphere Reserve. Figures of animals and men fighting, hunting, dancing and playing musical instruments are depicted in these paintings.
samples.question: How many rock shelters are in Pachmarhi Reserve?

samples.context: Many tribals still live in the area. As children move ahead, they see a board with ‘Satpura Tiger Reserve’ written on it. Madhavji explains that Project Tiger was launched by the government to protect the tigers in the country.
samples.question: What is the purpose of Project Tiger?

samples.context: The objective of this project was to ensure the survival and maintenance of the tiger population in the country. Rock paintings are found in these shelters.
samples.question: What does Project Tiger aim to protect?

samples.context: Figures of animals and men fighting, hunting, dancing and playing musical instruments are depicted in these paintings. Rock shelters are also found inside the Satpura National Park.
samples.question: What scenes are depicted in rock paintings?
